document_name: Royal Decree 238/2013, incorporates the regulation on thermal installations in buildings
document_url: https://cdn.climatepolicyradar.org/ESP/2013/ESP-2013-05-04-Royal Decree 238_2013, incorporates the regulation on thermal installations in buildings_8a56b41081c1dcf306450fafc6aefe92.pdf
document_description: This Decree amends certain articles and technical instructions of the Thermal Installations in Buildings Regulation (RITE) of 2007 and transposes to Spanish legislation the EU Directive 2010/31/EU concerning to periodic inspections of heating systems. The Decree establishes higher energy performance requirements for heating and cooling equipment.
